text: Isaya Mukirania (also spelled Isaya Mukirane), known by his royal title Kibanzanga I, was the leader of the Rwenzururu movement and the first Omusinga (king) of the Kingdom of Rwenzururu. He was formally succeeded by his son Charles Mumbere over 43 years after his death, on 19 October 2009. ==References== Category:1966 deaths Category:20th-century monarchs in Africa Category:History of Uganda Category:Kingdom of Rwenzururu Category:Rwenzori Mountains Category:Year of birth missing Category:Date of birth missing Category:Place of birth missing Category:Place of death missing
title: Isaya Mukirania
